job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain AI-enhanced .NET applications using Microsoft technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of applications incorporating AI features, which falls under traditional software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI models and algorithms into our .NET applications
job_tasks.justification: This involves the practical implementation and integration of AI components within existing software systems.
This refers to ensuring the applications built are robust, perform well, and can handle increased load.
This indicates the need to build and maintain backend systems and services that support the AI functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: building and optimizing AI-powered applications and services

job_tasks.justification: This involves the maintenance of existing software, a core aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: responsible for the maintenance of and keeping older applications up to date

job_tasks.justification: This involves working with and integrating pre-existing AI models and algorithms.
This indicates the utilization and integration of generative AI models, specifically within the Azure OpenAI service.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement the newest technologies in (Azure) OpenAI

job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the focus on using Large Language Models (LLMs) to drive transformation.
job_tasks.phrase: using LLMs to transform how people work

job_tasks.justification: This shows a requirement to stay current with advancements in generative AI and LLMs.
job_tasks.phrase: keeping up-to-date with the newest advancement in GenAI. (of LLMs)

job_tasks.justification: This refers to the process of reviewing and verifying the quality and correctness of code.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing

job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes building applications that are robust and adhere to established quality standards.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure applications are scalable, secure, and compliant with best practices.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions integrating AI models, which is part of the modeling task.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with AI researchers to integrate AI models into applications.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies working with data pipelines and infrastructure, as AI models often rely on well-structured data.

soft_skills.phrase: keeping up-to-date with the newest advancement in GenAI.
Work in a startup like team inside a big company.
Work in a dynamic team where you can quickly make an impact
Work closely with other software engineers and AI specialists

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes the use of GenAI technologies like OpenAI and LLMs, focusing on integrating them into .NET applications. While it involves software development and some operational aspects, the core differentiator is the direct work with generative models to build new functionalities.
